label: Cash Management and Security
description: Products and services related to managing and securing cash, including cash registers, safes, and money bags.

subcategories.label: Cash Registers
subcategories.description: Electronic machines used to track and manage cash transactions.

subcategories.label: Safes
subcategories.description: Secure containers used to store cash and other valuables.

subcategories.label: Money Bags
subcategories.description: Bags used to transport and store cash.

subcategories.label: Cash Boxes
subcategories.description: Boxes used to store and transport cash.

subcategories.label: Cash Drawers
subcategories.description: Drawers used to store cash in cash registers and other machines.
